title: 📅 2025 League Draft Details
body:
🕗 League Draft:
Thursday, August 28th at 8:30 PM.

📊 Draft Order:
1. Chris
2. Joey
3. Evan
4. Isaac
5. Kyle
6. Connie
7. Andrew
8. Connor
9. Sean
10. Charlie
11. Mason
12. Luke

🧾 Roster Setup:
• 1 QB
• 2 RB
• 2 WR
• 1 TE
• 1 Flex (RB/WR/TE)
• 1 Kicker
• 1 Defense/Special Teams
• 6 Bench spots

🏆 Playoff Format:
• Two Conferences: Skim & Whole
• Top 3 seeds from each conference make playoffs
• Seed 1 receives a bye
• Seeds 2 vs. 3 — winner faces Seed 1
• Conference champions face off in the Fantasy Super Bowl
